snippet: Brazil's presidential contenders squared off in an acrimonious debate Thursday, trading barbs about corruption, nepotism and the ability to spark the stagnant economy....

headline.print_headline: Brazil Presidential Contenders Battle in Debate
headline.main: Brazil Presidential Contenders Battle in Debate

lead_paragraph: Brazil's presidential contenders squared off in an acrimonious debate Thursday, trading barbs about corruption, nepotism and the ability to spark the stagnant economy.
